PERSONA:
anna is a 35-year-old white woman living in a metropolitan area in the south atlantic region of the united states. she was born and raised in another country but has lived in the u.s. for over 21 years. anna is a college graduate with some post-graduate education and works in a profession that allows her to earn a middle-class income of over $100,000 per year.

despite her successful career, anna maintains a liberal political ideology and leans towards supporting the democratic party. she identifies as agnostic and does not actively practice any religion or attend religious services. anna is married but does not have children yet.

in her free time, anna enjoys spending time online and is an almost constant user of the internet. she values education and self-improvement but does not currently participate in any volunteering activities. anna leads an urban lifestyle in a metropolitan area and embraces the diversity and cultural richness that comes with living in a major city.
